properties.address: st Mary & St Peters Church Hall, Barham IP6 0PT, Suffolk IP6 0AZ
properties.title: Friday Drop-in at Barham

properties.address: Jetty Lane, Woodbridge, Suffolk IP12 4BA
properties.description: Our warm space is run by a consortium of organisations: Jetty Lane, a charity which inspires hope, facilitates support and makes opportunities happen for young people, Rubbish Walks' Vintage Litter Museum (the first in this country) and Transition Woodbridge, a community-led group that aims to strengthen the local economy, reduce the cost of living and prepare for a future with less oil and a changing climate. We're based in 2 bright blue recycled shipping containers, if you walk next to Kingston Field, towards the River Deben you won't miss us! Our space will continue to stay open every Friday and Saturday through the spring and summer into autumn 2024.
properties.title: The Pod at Jetty Lane in Woodbridge

properties.address: Castle Hill United Reformed Church, Ipswich, Suffolk IP1 6QF
properties.description: A warm welcome and free tea, coffee and biscuits. Accessible toilets and free WiFi, every Tuesday 10-12. Large selection of cake on first Tuesday of the month (By donation, but only if able) Knitting group also on 3rd Tuesday of the month.

properties.address: St Helen’s Church, Saint Helen's Street, Ipswich IP4 2LS, UK
properties.description: All are welcome at our Tuesday Gathering. A free light lunch and hot drinks provided alongside friendly chat and community. Thursday is our Top up shop and Café. For a donation of £2 top up your weekly shop with a bag of food and essential items. Then join us in the café for a free cake and hot drink and friendly chat with others..
